text: "New York Groove" was written in 1975 by Russ Ballard (released by the band 'Hello') and covered in 1978 song by Ace Frehley from glam rock band Kiss and taken from his 1978 album Ace Frehley. It went to number 13 in the United States, number 29 in Australia, number 24 in New Zealand, number 25 in Canada and number 4 in South Africa. The original version was released in 1975 by glam rock band Hello. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:Kiss (band) songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: New York Groove
